recipesJson.name: Butterfly peachy kisses
recipesJson.author: Jazzy_girl
recipesJson.description: I really love the WF Peach pie and cream flavor so i decided to build my butterfly kisses around it.  It's a little weak so i paired it with one drop Peach and to give it a little boost I added the orange cream tpa.  All built over the beautiful flavor VBIC by FW with a little added cream fa Vienna cream.  I seen the first yellow butterfly yesterday so this recipe reminds of the delicate and beautiful kiss of a butterfly ðŸ¦‹
